document.docAuthor: Zanata, Angela M. & Vari, Richard P.
document.docOrigin: Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 145 (1)
document.masterDocTitle: The family Alestidae (Ostariophysi, Characiformes): a phylogenetic analysis of a trans-Atlantic clade

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The family Alestidae (Ostariophysi, Characiformes): a phylogenetic analysis of a trans-Atlantic clade
